response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance efficiency and productivity in various applications. Given its exceptional capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $18,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your potential to benefit significantly from this investment. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or have any questions about how this product could specifically impact your needs.", "product_price": 18000}
